properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tuimbe wote tushangilie
Mwokozi Yesu amefufuka.x2
(Ameliacha kaburi wazi) x2.
(Mwokozi Yesu amefufuka) x2.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Asubuhi mapema amefufuka
ameacha walizi wakishangaa.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Malaika alifika toka juu
akalitoa jiwe pale mlangoni.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tupige makofi na vigelegele
Mwokozi Yesu
ameshinda mauti.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tumpe zawadi gani
Bwana Yesu kwa kutukomboa
toka mautini.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Tusimame na turukeruke
juu tuufurahie ukobozi wetu.
